array.string: No, Kostya. He's a Light one. And Light ones only drink blood in one situation... when they're hunting those like us.
Go away! Go away, you filth! I'll rip your little head off!
Night Watch. Everyone step out of the Twilight.
You want to be human? Then act like a human.
Yes, Yegor. They are little boys who have been known to suck all the life out of their parents.
Since the time immemorial, the knights who call themselves the Warriors of Light have been chasing witches and sorcerers who torture humans.
He can see us. He's an Other.
But as long as there are those who believe in Light, hope is still here.
Ah, the Light mage with a Dark past has come... just the one I'm looking for...
A miracle in feathers. Mmm? Well, say something. Be human.
Turn away!... Turn away!... Don't turn around!
What, you've sunk to pig's blood?
